description: Try our easy to follow Spicy Chilli Prawn Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Spicy Chilli Prawn Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a chargrill pan over medium-high heat. Cook prawns, turning often, for about 4 minutes or until they change colour. Add to salad, drizzle with remaining dressing and serve.
